      • jsonCreateAdvertisement

        public static java.lang.String jsonCreateAdvertisement(java.lang.Float margin_percentage,
                                                       boolean trade_type,
                                                       java.lang.Float payment_window_minutes,
                                                       java.lang.String country_id,
                                                       int min_limit,
                                                       int max_limit,
                                                       java.lang.String terms,
                                                       java.util.List<PaymentMethodDTO> paymentMethodList,
                                                       java.lang.String coin,
                                                       java.util.ArrayList<TimeSlotDTO> timeSlotList)
        Parameters:
        margin_percentage - - upto user at what margin user want to trade(buy/sell)
        trade_type - - if (@param trade_type == 1 == Sell) else { @param trade_type == 2 == Buy }
        payment_window_minutes - - user can decide the payment window time (exam: 60min
        country_id - - from which country user creating advertisement
        min_limit - - user will decide what would be the minimum trade limit
        max_limit - - user will decide what would be the maximum trade limit
        terms - - if user want to some terms & condition related to advertisement
        paymentMethodList - - user will select payment method by which user want to receive payment is advertise is for sell
        coin - - for which coin user is creating advertisement
        timeSlotList - - ByDefault advertisement display time is 9-6 but user can select when the advertise will be displayed
        Returns:
        See Also:
        jsonCreateAdvertisement(Float, boolean, Float, String, int, int, String, List, String, ArrayList)

      • verifyComplexity

        public static java.lang.String verifyComplexity(java.lang.String complexity_secret,
                                                int challengeType,
                                                double complexity)
        create verifyComplexity payload
        Parameters:
        complexity_secret - - OTP Received by SMS or Gmail Challenge type for different
        challengeType - == 1.0 == RELEASE_COIN
        challengeType - == 2.0 == CHANGE_PASSWORD
        challengeType - == 3.0 == CHANGE_EMAIL
        challengeType - == 4.0 == FORGOT_PASSWORD
        challengeType - == 5.0 == WITHDRAWAL
        complexity - - Mnemonics, MOBILE, GMAIL and GAuth
        Returns:
